title: What is your cancellation policy?
content: Our standard policy allows free cancellation up to 7 days before the travel date. Specific tours may have stricter policies, which are noted on the tour page.

title: Do you offer custom tour packages?
content: Yes, we specialize in tailoring unique travel experiences. Contact our customer support team to discuss your specific requirements.

title: How can I check the status of my booking?
content: You can check your booking status by logging into your account or by using the 'Manage Booking' link at the top of the homepage with your reservation number.
